== Gulur (611569) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Gulur is a village in the [[Tumkur ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 380.69 hectares and harbouring 1141 households with total population of 4658 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Tumkur]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 2335 and female population is 2323. Scheduled Caste Population is 759 and Scheduled Tribes population is 334. Census Location Code of the village is 611569<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 3336 (71.62%)
* Literate male population: 1773 (75.93%)
* Literate female population: 1563 (67.28%)
